text: Kyle Balda (born March 9, 1971) is an American animator and movie director. He is best known for directing the Illumination movies Minions (2015) and Despicable Me 3 (2017), with Pierre Coffin and Minions: The Rise of Gru (2022). ==Filmography== Year Title Notes 1994 The Mask Graphics animator 1995 Jumanji Animation supervisor 1996 Mars Attacks!
